mapper.insert: insert into input (manufacturer_code, product_code, warehoused_quantity, warehoused_date) values (#{manufacturerCode}, #{productCode}, #{warehousedQuantity}, COALESCE(#{warehousedDate},CURRENT_DATE));
mapper.select: select i.input_num, p.product_name, m.manufacturer_name, i.warehoused_quantity, i.warehoused_date from input i join product p on i.product_code = p.product_code join manufacture m on m.manufacturer_code = i.manufacturer_code order by input_num;

select p.product_code as productCode, p.product_name as productName, m.manufacturer_name as manufacturerName, m.manufacturer_code as manufacturerCode, inv.price as price from input i join product p on i.product_code = p.product_code join manufacture m on m.manufacturer_code = i.manufacturer_code join inventory inv on inv.product_code = p.product_code order by p.product_name;
